pkgmetadata.longdescription: Chart of accounts 'SKR04'=========================- A german account chart module for the Tryton application platform.- Converted and adapted by the module 'account_de_skr03'- Contains the accounts according to SKR04Install======= pip install mds-account-de-skr04Changes=======*6.8.7 - 23.06.2023*- compatiblity to Tryton 6.8
